ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the thing about which they differ.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: About which they have been differing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that they are in utter disagreement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Regarding which they hold different views.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: About which they are in disagreement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Concerning which they are in disagreement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: concerning which they are in disagreement!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the one about which they differ?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: About which they are in disagreement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That over which they are in disagreement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:3] concerning which they are at variance, for the believers affirm it, while the disbelievers repudiate it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Concerning which they are in disagreement) some of them disbelieve in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an while others believe in them. This is because whenever Gabriel brought down a section of the Qur'an to the Prophet (pbuh) and he recited it to them, they used to talk about it, and some of them would believe while others would persist in their disbelief.
